resources.string: Please choose how you would like to get the photo
To add a report hold down your finger on the map.
An invalid email address was entered
Looks like the URL entered is not a Boskoi or Ushahidi instance
Failed to post SMS to Boskoi. Make sure username and password are correct
Tap your location on the map. You can tap with your finger to move the marker.
This means all incoming sms will be pushed to Boskoi
Boskoi will automatically download new reports.
Set how often Boskoi syncronizes with the selected instance.
A location can not currently be determined. Enable more location sources i.e. GPS Satellites in Security and Location Settings.
Your location could not be determined. Make sure you have pin point the exact location on the map.
Report successfully posted online and is awaiting approval.
Report sent to local storage due to unvailability of internet. Remember to sync to the online instance when there there is internet connection.
Failed to send report.Check to see if you filled all required fields.
Connection failure, cannot submit your report.
Enter a title for the incident
Enter a description for the incident
The location description must be at least 3 characters long
Select at least one edible type
A first name must be at least 3 characters long
A last name must be at least 3 characters long
No reports for this edible found
Network error, please ensure you are connected to the internet
An error occurred fetching the reports. Make sure you entered an Ushahidi instance.
Are you sure you want to clear the cache?
The location where you want to store items saved from the selected instance.
Select the Boskoi instance that you wish to interact with.
For attribution when submitting a report (optional).
Also for attribution when submitting a report (optional).
The total number of reports to fetch from the selected instance.

A mobile phone guide to edible urban wild-food sources, combining the ancient skills of foragers with current open source media. 

This pilot-project is initiated by FoAm (http://www.fo.am),
supported by het Prins Bernhard cultuurfonds (http://www.prinsbernhardcultuurfonds.nl)
and developed by 
Joey van der Bie (http://www.vanderBie.net), 
Maarten van der Mark (http://www.vdmark.info) and 
Vincent Vijn (http://www.vijn.me)
Boskoi is a guide to edible urban wild-food sources. Before starting please read the following information.
Ask permission when ownership is unclear
Only pick what you will eat. Leave most for others (or wildlife)
Be ware of toxicity and don\'t tread on other plants when picking
Don\'t put any rare or protected species on the map
Boskoi is licensed under the LGPL v3 license. More information on http://www.boskoi.org/open
We use Google Analytics to improve our application, read what this implies on http://goo.gl/2EXSr. A version without Analytics can be provided on request
Thank you for taking the time to read our rules, if you accept our terms you are free to enjoy the fruits of the world!

For using the application we urge you to follow these rules:
 
 1. Be friendly.
 Ask permission when ownership is unclear.
 
 2. Be generous
 How much do you really need? Only pick what you will eat. Leave most for others (or wildlife).
 
 3. Be alert
 Be ware of toxicity and don't tread on other plants when picking.
 
 4. Be careful
 Don't put any rare or protected species on the map.
 
 Thank you for taking the time to read our rules, now enjoy the fruits of the world!

Licensing

 Boskoi is an Open Source platform based on Ushahidi (http://www.ushahidi.com)

 Boskoi is licensed under the LGPL v3 license (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html)

 More information on http://www.boskoi.org/open

Privacy

 For improving our application we log user behavior using Google Analytics.

 This logging is stored on the Google Analytics server and is used privately, we do not share this information with other parties! The Google Analytics usage license can be found on: 
 http://www.google.com/intl/en_uk/analytics/tos.html

 You should note that the analytics currently can not be turned off. If you do not want us to log your behavior please inform us and we will supply you with a version which does not log your behavior.
Tap on an item to view content:
